content:
Russian invaders hit March 21 on Nikolaev with a ballistic missile. One killed and four wounded is known.

About thisreportedThe head of the Nikolaev ova Vitaliy Kim in Telegram.

“4 victims (three women, one person). Another 1 woman died. The search is still ongoing, ”he wrote.

Mayor of Nikolaev Alexander Senkevichaddedthat is currently establishing the consequences of Russian attack in the city.

“We make a detour in the residential sector. On multi -storey building - without damage. We examine the private sector, ”he wrote.
title: In Nikolaev, a person was killed as a result of a blow of the Russian Federation, four more were injured
description: This was reported by the head of the Nikolaev ova Vitaliy Kim in Telegram. “4 affected ...
author: Army Inform
